lexUnit.name: lump.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a compact mass, especially one without a definite or regular shape.

sentence.text: I do n't believe that we 're all born equal , as lumps of dough that are later shaped by our peers and parents and so forth â€¦
There is another source of light between these walls , a light which can not flicker and die like that from the misshapen lump of white wax dripping into the saucer on my table .

I remember an officer diving into a culvert during a raid -- he thought he had been hit again but it was only a lump of mud on his seat !

The chef mashed a lump of raw gristle on his stove , and kept it down until it was half charcoal .

I carry sugar lumps around with me and feed him those .

She picked up a small flowerpot-shaped lump of earth .
